>
[Archon Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1358) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 36 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Lawbringer](/Feats.aspx?ID=1352)

</column>

---

You can tap into the heavenly magic that is your birthright. You can cast [_continual flame_](/Spells.aspx?ID=50) and [_shield other_](/Spells.aspx?ID=281) each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.
